CraftData.Description: Automatically digs a V shaped tunnel starting at 5 blocks wide, and increasing 2 blocks in width per level to a maximum distance of 64 blocks.
CraftData.Hint: Great for digging Cryoplasm assault tunnels.

CraftData.Description: Automatically digs a square tunnel, 3x3 in size to a maximum distance of 64 blocks.
CraftData.Hint: Great for digging a channel for Dazzler Turrets to attack melted cryoplasm.
